Yuzu has never really talked about his sexuality before and I don’t think there is anything published about his sexuality. I wonder what made you suspect he is gay. Yuzu usually gives hugs and has lots of physical contact with other male figure skater but that’s normal. Most figure skaters are quite friendly to each other off-ice, friendly enough to hug each other and the likes. Even if he was gay though, I don’t think that will affect his performance on the ice. He will still be able to skate beautifully and gracefully, always showing his artistry. If he is gay, I don’t think it would be a good enough reason for his fans to stop supporting him.
